item.title: 市场并不担心美联储的独立性
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 德国天然气溢价飙升预示储气忧虑持续存在
item.description: 德国天然气期货交易较欧洲基准的溢价跃升至三年来的新高，表明对其燃料库存过低的担忧依然存在。【原文：The premium that German natural gas futures trade above Europe’s benchmark jumped to a three-year high, signaling that concerns about its low fuel inventories remain.】

item.title: 乌克兰MHP计划发行入侵以来的首支公司债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，农业公司 MHP SE 正在评估投资者对乌克兰企业部门自俄罗斯全面入侵以来首次发行债券的兴趣。【原文：Agricultural firm MHP SE is gauging investor interest in what would be the Ukrainian corporate sector’s first bond since Russia’s full scale-invasion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: KKR 将投资布鲁克菲尔德的 Compass 数据中心资产
item.description: KKR & Co.同意投资由布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）支持的数字基础设施运营商 Compass Datacenters 的投资组合，私募股权巨头们竞相在人工智能热潮中分得一杯羹。【原文：KKR & Co. agreed to invest in the portfolio of Compass Datacenters, the digital infrastructure operator backed by Brookfield Asset Management Ltd., as private equity giants race to grab a bigger piece of the AI boom.】

item.title: 客户不知道该向谁付款，First Brands 的业务陷入困境
item.description: 在 First Brands 集团通过破产法庭的过程中，这家汽车零部件供应商遇到了一个意想不到的麻烦：它的客户似乎不知道该向谁付款。【原文：As First Brands Group makes its way through bankruptcy court, the auto-parts supplier is bumping up against an unexpected snafu: Its customers don’t seem to know who to pay.】

item.title: 秘鲁非正规挖掘者获准延期至明年
item.description: 秘鲁国会批准将非正式金矿和铜矿开采者使用的一项有争议的许可延长一年，该许可的要求比正规行业宽松。【原文：Peru’s Congress approved a one-year extension for a controversial permit used by informal gold and copper miners to operate with looser requirements than the formal industry.】

item.title: 欧盟计划加快跨境电力连接以降低电费
item.description: 欧盟执行机构将寻求加快跨境电网的建设，并警告说，多年来投资不足和各自为政的规划正在推高能源账单。【原文：The European Union’s executive arm will seek to accelerate the construction of cross-border power grids, warning that years of underinvestment and fragmented planning is pushing up energy bills.】

item.title: 前多伦多道明银行家因科文被解雇后提起诉讼
item.description: 据彭博新闻社看到的法庭文件显示，道明证券股票资本市场业务部前董事总经理马克-弗格森（Mark Ferguson）以不当解雇为由起诉该银行。【原文：Mark Ferguson, a former managing director in the equity capital markets business at TD Securities, is suing the bank for wrongful dismissal, according to court filings seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 调查显示欧佩克上月石油产量保持稳定
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，欧佩克的原油产量在上个月保持稳定，因为在全球石油市场动荡之际，该组织保持了谨慎的策略。【原文：OPEC’s crude production was steady last month as the group maintained a cautious strategy while global oil markets falter, a Bloomberg survey showed.】

item.title: 软银正在洽谈收购数据中心投资商 DigitalBridge
item.description: 据知情人士透露，软银集团正在洽谈收购投资数据中心等资产的私募股权公司 DigitalBridge Group Inc.【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. is in talks to acquire DigitalBridge Group Inc., a private equity firm that invests in assets such as data centers, as it seeks to take advantage of an AI-driven boom in digital infrastructure, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士表示美国将做出更多让步以降低关税
item.description: 瑞士正在努力敲定上个月达成的一项协议，如果能从唐纳德-特朗普政府那里换取更低的关税，瑞士愿意对从美国进口的商品做出更多让步。【原文：Switzerland is willing to offer more concessions on imports from the US if it can get even lower tariffs in return from Donald Trump’s administration, as it works to finalize an agreement reached last month.】

item.title: 让埃里克-特朗普在 70% 路由之前进入美国比特币的人
item.description: 埃里克-特朗普在 9 月份敲响了纳斯达克的钟声，庆祝美国比特币公司（American Bitcoin Corp.三个月后，该公司股价暴跌 70%。【原文：Eric Trump rang the Nasdaq bell in September to celebrate a more than $500 million windfall from American Bitcoin Corp.’s trading debut. Three months later, the shares have cratered 70%.】

item.title: 美国 9 月消费者支出停滞，通胀率保持一致
item.description: 美国 9 月份的消费支出停滞不前，这表明美国人在政府停摆前面对顽固的通货膨胀已经捉襟见肘。【原文：US consumer spending stalled in September, suggesting Americans were already stretched going into the government shutdown in the face of stubborn inflation.】

item.title: 纽约时报》、《芝加哥论坛报》起诉 "糊涂 "人工智能，版权大战一触即发
item.description: 纽约时报》和《芝加哥论坛报》起诉 Perplexity AI 公司，称这家人工智能搜索初创公司正在复制和传播它们的独家内容，这是针对人工智能开发商的诉讼浪潮中的最新一起。【原文：The New York Times Co. and the Chicago Tribune sued Perplexity AI Inc., saying the artificial intelligence search startup is copying and distributing their exclusive content, the latest in a wave of lawsuits against AI developers.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数五个月来首次上升
item.description: 美国消费者信心五个月来首次上升，原因是通胀预期改善，个人财务前景更加乐观。【原文：US consumer sentiment rose for the first time in five months, bolstered by a more optimistic outlook for personal finances as inflation expectations improved.】

item.title: 前高盛银行家罗杰-吴（Roger Ng）申请推翻 1MDB 定罪失败
item.description: 前高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）银行家罗杰-吴（Roger Ng）因帮助马来西亚 1MDB 基金掠夺数十亿美元而被联邦定罪，这是历史上最大的金融犯罪之一，但他在推翻联邦定罪的诉讼中败诉。【原文：Former Goldman Sachs Group Inc banker Roger Ng lost a long shot bid to overturn his federal conviction for helping loot billions of dollars from Malaysian fund 1MDB, one of the largest financial crimes in history.】

item.title: 美国股市在 PCE 数据公布前上涨，Netflix 因 WBD 交易下跌
item.description: 在周五的通胀数据公布前，美国股市上涨，投资者为下周的美联储决议做准备。【原文：US stocks rose ahead of inflation data on Friday as investors position for next week’s Federal Reserve decision.】

item.title: 危机加剧，中国万科寻求推迟第二次债券偿付
item.description: 中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.）提议推迟偿还另一笔地方债券，这是这家陷入困境的国有建筑商面临日益严峻的流动性挑战的最新信号。【原文：China Vanke Co. proposed delaying repayment of another local bond in the latest signal of mounting liquidity challenges for the embattled state-backed builder.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦认为通胀下行风险大于上行风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲中央银行面临的通胀放缓风险大于通胀加速的风险，如果通胀持续低于 2% 的目标，欧洲中央银行将采取行动。【原文：The European Central Bank faces greater risks of inflation easing than accelerating, and would act if there’s persistent undershoot of its 2% target, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 美国称，杜权因 "巨额 "加密货币欺诈应被判处 12 年监禁
item.description: 美国检察官称，Terraform Labs Pte. 联合创始人 Do Kwon 因欺诈导致 TerraUSD 稳定币在 2022 年以 400 亿美元的价格崩盘，应被判处 12 年监禁。【原文：Terraform Labs Pte. co-founder Do Kwon should be sentenced to 12 years in prison for the fraud that led to the TerraUSD stablecoin’s $40 billion collapse in 2022, US prosecutors said.】

item.title: 卫星初创公司 Iceye 以 28 亿美元估值融资，欧洲提升国防开支
item.description: Iceye是芬兰的一家卫星开发商，曾与多家公司签订了国防合同，该公司利用整个欧洲的军费开支热潮，以24亿欧元（28亿美元）的估值进行了融资。【原文：Iceye, a Finnish satellite developer with a number of defense contracts, has raised money at a €2.4 billion ($2.8 billion) valuation, capitalizing on the military spending boom across Europe.】

item.title: 美国承诺为刚果关键矿产供应链提供超过 10 亿美元的资金
item.description: 美国正在商谈为中部非洲的两个重要矿产和铁路项目提供超过 10 亿美元的资金，以确保被认为对国家安全至关重要的供应。【原文：The US is in talks to provide more than $1 billion for two critical minerals and railway projects in central Africa as it seeks to secure supplies deemed crucial for national security.】

item.title: 比特币十年来首次脱离股市涨势
item.description: 彭博社汇编的数据显示，2025 年，S&P 500 指数攀升了 16% 以上，而比特币却下跌了 3%；这是自 2014 年以来首次出现股票上涨而代币下跌的情况。【原文：The S&P 500 has climbed more than 16% in 2025, while Bitcoin is down 3% — the first time since 2014 that stocks have rallied while the token is down, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 乌克兰称袭击了俄罗斯石油公司 Syzran 炼油厂和亚速海港口
item.description: 乌克兰说，它袭击了俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）的 Syzran 炼油厂和俄罗斯亚速海沿岸的一个小港口。【原文：Ukraine said it attacked Rosneft PJSC’s Syzran refinery and a small port on Russia’s Azov Sea coast, adding to spate of recent strikes that are becoming costly for Moscow and the country’s oil industry.】

item.title: 哈塞特支持美联储主席应居住在各地区的呼吁
item.description: 国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）支持财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的呼吁，即在任命联邦储备银行行长时新设居住地要求。【原文：National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett backed Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s call for a new residency requirement in the appointment of presidents of Federal Reserve banks.】

item.title: 爱尔兰贷款机构 Permanent TSB 为重新引入奖金敞开大门
item.description: 永久性 TSB 集团控股公司已与工会达成协议，明年将增加工资，并将就重新为员工发放奖金一事进行谈判。【原文：Permanent TSB Group Holdings Plc has reached an agreement with unions to increase pay next year and will enter negotiation about reintroducing bonuses for its staffers.】

item.title: Pinebridge 认为新兴市场的反弹倾向于债券
item.description: Pinebridge Investments 预计，随着美元重新走强，明年新兴市场资产的涨势将向固定收益倾斜，并远离货币。【原文：Pinebridge Investments expects the rally in emerging-market assets to tilt toward fixed income next year and away from currencies as the dollar regains strength.】

item.title: 加拿大就业岗位第三个月意外增加 5.36 万个
item.description: 加拿大经济在 11 月份增加了 5.36 万个就业岗位，连续第三个月出人意料地实现强劲就业增长，而美国的关税则减缓了经济活动。【原文：The Canadian economy added 53,600 jobs in November, making it the third consecutive month of surprisingly strong job gains as US tariffs otherwise slow down activity.】

item.title: 阿布扎比基金阻止 8 亿美元私人股权资产大洗牌
item.description: 一家总部位于休斯顿的私募股权投资公司在试图将其一项资产出售给自己时，因一名投资者喊冤而停滞不前，这是此类纠纷首次出现在公众视野中。【原文：A Houston-based private equity firm was stopped in its tracks when an investor cried foul as it tried to sell one of its assets to itself, one of the first times such a dispute has spilled into public view.】

item.title: EQT 和 PAI 成为 20 亿欧元保险经纪公司 Global 的竞购者之一
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 EQT AB、PAI Partners 和 Stone Point 已入围德国保险经纪公司 Global Group 的竞标。【原文：Private equity firms EQT AB, PAI Partners and Stone Point have been shortlisted in the bidding for German insurance brokerage Global Group, people familiar with the matter said.】
